title: 26 Virtual Console Games [WAD-packed] PAL
description:
This map contains 26 Virual Console games. The games are all WAD-packed and easy to install with the WAD-installer on a PAL Wii (NO MODCHIP NEEDED).

The only thing you need is a copy of Zelda: Twilight Princess and a SD-card.

To install these games: install the Twilight Hack and load the WAD-installer v2 (use Google). 

All these games are playable with a Classic Controller or a GameCube controller. The NES games will work with the Wii Mote (sideways).

This pack contains:

- Super Mario 64 [N64]
- Mario Kart 64 [N64]
- Paper Mario [N64]
- Pokemon Snap [N64]
- Yoshi&#039;s Story [N64]
- Zelda: The Ocarina of Time [N64]
- Donkey Kong Country 2 [SNES]
- Final Fight [SNES]
- Zelda: A Link to the Past [SNES]
- Donkey Kong Junior [NES]
- The Adventures of Kirby [NES]
- Mario Bros 3 [NES]
- Operation Wolf [NES]
- Super Mario Bros [NES]
- Sonic the Hedgehog 3 [SEGA MegaDrive]
- Bomberman &#039;93 [Turbo GFX]
- Breath of Fire [SNES]
- F-Zero [SNES]
- Super Mario Bros: Lost Levels [NES]
- Metroid Prime [NES]
- Super Metroid [SNES]
- Street Fighter 2 [NES]
- Super Mario Picross [Famicom]
- Lylat Wars [N64]
- Kirby 64 [N64]
- Phantasy Star 3 [SEGA MegaDrive]

The games are all PAL and tested. But don&#039;t blame me if anything isn&#039;t working or if you&#039;ve bricked anything!

(ps. if you want to uninstall these games: use the WAD-uninstaller).

Have fun,

Monnick
